commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Use storage scope instead of keyword

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Now scope the entire string as a whole and use embedded scopes for interpolation.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Allow for functions without a body
commits.body: These are used in protocol blocks, before the end was never found as a `{}` block isn't used.

commits.author: John Regner
commits.summary: Add simple folding markers for swift
commits.body: The Folding markers are based on the simple '{\s*$' and '^\s*}'

commits.author: John Regner
commits.body:
Previously capture specifiers were lumped in with declaration-specifier.
Moved them to their own group.
Improved matching of unowned(safe) and unowned(unsafe). Previously these
would not have matched but their incorrect counterparts
(unownedsafe, unownedunsafe) would have matched.

commits.author: John Regner
commits.summary: Add Support for UInt, Int[8|16|32|64] & Float80

commits.author: nemesit
commits.summary: Remove -i option as it got removed and is no longer necessary

commits.author: René Schwaiger
commits.summary: Split arguments for executor into array items

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Remove deprecated method and save modified files before running.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match invocation method from Shell Script bundle
commits.body: This adds a <kbd class='tabTrigger'>swift⇥</kbd> shebang snippet to work in any document and enhances the <kbd class='tabTrigger'>env⇥</kbd> snippet when used in a swift document. The snippets will only fire when used at the very beginning of a document.

commits.author: nemesit
commits.body:
Add TextMate.save_if_untitled('swift'), chang the ruby shebang, and make the run command itself more generic.

Signed-off-by: nemesit <nemesit@myriadvisuals.com>

commits.author: nemesit
commits.summary: Update language grammar and add snippets
commits.body: Create a few helpful snippets, add syntax features. Add license info of syntax used as a starting point.

commits.author: Konstantin Dorodov
commits.summary: Run: add osx sdk path as argument to enable import of Cocoa

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Add comments to grammar and settings
